i1.name: Hextech Capacitor
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Each time '''Jayce''' switches between {{sbc|{{ai|Transform Mercury Hammer|Jayce|Hammer Stance}}}} and {{sbc|{{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Stance}}}} he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{tip|ghosting}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between Hammer Stance and Cannon Stance he gains 40 bonus movement speed and ghosting for 1.25 seconds.

q1.name: To the Skies!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within an area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Jayce leaps to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing physical damage to all enemies within an area and slowing them for 2 seconds.
q1.notes: * ''To The Skies!'' will always direct '''Jayce''' linearly to his target's location.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

q2.name: Shock Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' fires an orb of electricity in the target direction, detonating upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path to deal {{as|physical damage}} to it and other enemies within the area and briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the area.

If the orb passes through {{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce}}, it supercharges, instantly increasing its speed and remaining distance and causing the subsequent blast to be larger and deal 40% increased damage.
q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce fires an orb of electricity in the target direction, detonating upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path to deal physical damage to it and other enemies within the area and briefly grant sight of the area.
If the orb passes through Acceleration Gate, it supercharges, instantly increasing its speed and remaining distance and causing the subsequent blast to be larger and deal 40% increased damage.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 330 6}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|{{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce|Accelerated}} Damage|{{ap|55*1.4 to 330*1.4 6}} {{as|(+ 168% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q2.notes:
* ''Shock Blast'' will fire from wherever '''Jayce''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Upon touching {{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce}}, the enhanced missile gains its remaining range equal to [ 1600 units - travelled distance of the standard missile ].
** This means that the range of the enhanced ''Shock Blast'' is always the same, regardless of how early or late it interacted with ''Acceleration Gate''.
** Supercharging the ''Shock Blast'' as soon as possible, however, will improve its average speed significantly. 
*** For this, '''Jayce''' must stand inside or very close to the ''Acceleration Gate'', or place it very close to himself right after ''Shock Blast's'' cast time.
* ''Shock Blast's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.
** ''Shock Blast'' will '''always''' damage the enemy it collided with, even if it is so large that it is outside the effect radius.
* The non-enhanced ''Shock Blast'' detonation has a slightly smaller sight radius than the radius in which it deals damage.{{bug|2}}
q2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{ap|55 to 80 6}} as 55/60/65/70/75/80 and riot's value 40,40,40,40,40,40 as 40
q2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '8' as '8' and riot's value '16,14,12,10,8,6' as '16/14/12/10/8/6'

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Accelerated Damage: (+ 168% bonus AD)

w1.name: Lightning Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jayce's basic attacks on-hit restore mana.
Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|25 to 100 6}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|25*4 to 100*4 6}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|10|Starts on cast}}' as '10/0' and riot's value '10,10,10,10,10,10' as '10'

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 25% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)

w2.name: Hyper Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|300% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds, with each one dealing modified damage.
''Hyper Charge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Jayce's''' basic attack timer, and the modified damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike|critical strike}} modifiers.
w2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce gains 300% bonus attack speed on his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds, with each one dealing modified damage.
Hyper Charge resets Jayce's basic attack timer, and the modified damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
w2.notes:
* The last basic attack is checked [[on-hit]] rather than [[on-attack]].
** If {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} hit the target before the basic attack does, the basic attack damage will not be modified.
w2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|13 to 5 6}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/11/9/7/5/3/0' and riot's value '10,10,10,10,10,10' as '10'

e1.name: Thundering Blow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|monsters}}, while also marking a location 500 units away from him in the direction of the target, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them to it.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage, capped against monsters, while also marking a location 500 units away from him in the direction of the target, pulling them to it.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|8 to 20 6}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|200 to 700 6}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: % of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Monster Damage:

st_slices: % of target's '''maximum''' health (+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)

e2.name: Acceleration Gate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of its area and granting all allied {{tip|champion|champions}} who come in contact with it, including himself, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 3 seconds. The buff is continuously refreshed inside the gate.
e2.descriptionHtml: Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting sight of its area and granting all allied champions who come in contact with it, including himself, bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds. The buff is continuously refreshed inside the gate.
e2.notes: * The ''Gate'' grants the bonus in an area {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 750 units wide and {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 100 units thick.
e2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  50 as 50 and riot's value 55,55,55,55,55,55 as 55
e2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '16' as '16' and riot's value '20,18,16,14,12,10' as '20/18/16/14/12/10'

r1.name: Transform Mercury Cannon
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' transforms the {{ai|Transform Mercury Hammer|Jayce|Mercury Hammer}} into the [[File: Transform Mercury Cannon.png|20px|link=]] ''Mercury Cannon'', receiving access to its [[champion ability|abilities]], becoming {{tip|ranged}} with {{sti|500 attack range}}, and empowering his next [[basic attack]] to reduce the target's {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by {{pp|key=%|10 to 25 for 4|1 to 16}} for 5 seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce transforms the Mercury Hammer into the File: Transform Mercury Cannon.png Mercury Cannon, receiving access to its champion ability, becoming ranged with 500 attack range, and empowering his next basic attack to reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by 1 to 16 ‒ undefined for 5 seconds.
Unknown value: Data Jayce/Transform Mercury Hammer pst2 description2
r1.notes:
*Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The resistance reduction does not apply to structures.
* Both ''Transform'' on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when ''Jayce'' either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
* The enhanced attack will not be consumed if it is parried ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}, and {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}).
* ''Transform's'' on-hit effects will not proc on wards.

r2.name: Transform Mercury Hammer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' transforms the {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Mercury Cannon}} into the [[File: Transform Mercury Hammer.png|20px|link=]] ''Mercury Hammer'', receiving access to its [[champion ability|abilities]], becoming {{tip|melee}} with {{sti|125 attack range}}, gaining {{pp|5 to 35 for 4|1 to 16}} {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, and empowering his next basic attack to deal {{as|{{pp|25 to 145 for 4|1 to 16}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
'''Jayce''' begins the game with ''Transform'' but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each have 6 ranks.
r2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce transforms the Mercury Cannon into the File: Transform Mercury Hammer.png Mercury Hammer, receiving access to its champion ability, becoming melee with 125 attack range, gaining 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, and empowering his next basic attack to deal 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage.
Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic Champion ability each have 6 ranks.
r2.notes:
*Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The enhanced attack will not be consumed if it is parried ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}, and {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}).
* The ''Mercury Hammer's'' bonus damage can affect structures.
* Both ''Transform'' on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when '''Jayce''' either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
* ''Transform's'' on-hit effects will not proc on wards.
